review: Can't go wrong with the Chromecast.  We usually use it for Netflix or YouTube, but recently I got Plex and have been watching local content.  Also using Showbox (not officially supported) and Avia I don't even have to DL stuff to watch locally.  Easy to use, easy to set up, never crashes.  New apps are added every month or so, so this thing is just going to keep getting better.
